subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Phoenix Coyotes’ center Yanic Perreault, who has led the league in face-off percentage nearly as long as the statistic has been officially tabulated, seems to have always had to fight for respect in the N.H.L.
snippet: Phoenix Coyotes’ center Yanic Perreault, who has led the league in face-off percentage nearly as long as the statistic has been officially tabulated, seems to have always had to fight for respect in the N.H.L.
